job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-27T20:00:16.000Z", "description": "

Infotrend, Inc. is seeking for a cryptocurrency expert who has the understanding and on-hands experience with the following: 


 Responsibilities:

\u00b7      Hands on experience with setting up nodes for Bitcoin and Ethereum.

\u00b7      Understand the major and critical data points in cryptocurrency transactions.

\u00b7      Extract mempool data from nodes.

\u00b7      Understanding smart contracts and extract transactions from nodes.

\u00b7      Understand links and correlation between transactions within crypto data

\u00b7      Identify, track and corelate how transactions work within different exchanges

\u00b7      Do in-depth analysis of connection/co-relations between the blockchain and Exchange data.

\u00b7      Provide ad-hoc assistance on questions related to cryptocurrency data.

\u00b7      Provide guidance on data analysis and visualization of blockchain/exchange data.

\u00b7      Use scripting languages to perform extract crypto data and run analytics.

Requirements:

\u00b7      Bachelor\u2019s degree in Computer Science, Data Analytics or similar program

\u00b7      Hands on experience with setting up nodes on Bitcoin and Ethereum

\u00b7      In depth experience with managing block and transaction data for cyptocurrencies.

\u00b7      Experience with creating products and services that interface with public, private, and . permissioned blockchains.

\u00b7      Knowledge of data structures, especially crypto technology preferred.

\u00b7      Experience with SQL, Java Script, Python or R and ability to drill into the data and gain valuable . insights.

\u00b7      Strong problem-solving skills, attention to detail and high-quality output

\u00b7      Experience developing software applications and features in an Agile environment.

\u00b7      Self-motivated and able to tackle challenging, complex problems in an individual or

team-based setting.

 

US Citizenship Required

Ability to obtain and maintain Public Trust Security Clearance



Infotrend, Inc. is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state, or local law.
